sentences.sContent: How much carbon dioxide you save, if any, depends on how far you live from work and how you get there, among other things.
sentences.sContent_eng: How much carbon dioxide you save, if any, depends on how far you live from work and how you get there, among other things.
sentences.sCn: 如果真有的话，你可以节约多少二氧化碳？ 它取决于你住得有多远还是你如何完成目标抑或其他因素？

sentences.sContent: Studying the light in each image could also reveal physical characteristics, such as the presence of water or carbon dioxide.
sentences.sContent_eng: Studying the light in each image could also reveal physical characteristics, such as the presence of water or carbon dioxide.
sentences.sCn: 研究每个行星图像中的光线同样可以揭示物理特性，如是否存在水或二氧化碳。

sentences.sContent: And then we have gas cooled reactors which can use supercritical carbon dioxide or helium.
sentences.sContent_eng: And then we have gas cooled reactors which can use supercritical carbon dioxide or helium.
sentences.sCn: 然后我们有气体冷却反应堆,那能使用超临界二氧化碳或者氦。

phrases.pCn: 二氧化碳激光器；二氧化碳雷射

trans.tranOther: a chemical  compound  that contains two atoms of oxygen and one atom of another chemical  element
